name: Bridgez
description:
Bridgez. An incredibly bad "platformer" with no physics made in Scratch for the Trijam 179. It's very bad, and was made in 3.2 hours. So about 3:12. However I took breaks in between so the time may be greater.

Say all you want, just add the words "scuffed" or "trash" or any harsh words like that to your positive comments and reviews about this game. Make sure to drop a 1 star rating on the jam page!

Thank you. Now I can peacefully descend from the clouds to hell where this game and I should belong.
